name: Carrot Cake Petites
description: Good, gluten-free things come in small, bite-sized packages! These little delights are a sweet treat, without the commitment of baking a whole cake.
preparation: Place Perfect Petites on a Sheet Pan. Using a basting brush, generously brush with oil.
Coarsely grate carrots; measure out 2 cups and set aside.
In a bowl, whisk eggs with oil and pineapple. Stir in mix and 2 cups grated carrot. Evenly divide batter in Perfect Petites, about 1 tbsp per mold.
Bake 30–35 min, until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean and sides start pulling away from the pan. Rest in pan until cool to the touch, then pop out.
tips: Top cooked petites with prepared Chocolate Fudge Sauce (icing version). Topping each petite with 1⁄2 tbsp icing is still a Good Food. Real Results. dessert!
The 4-in-1 Spice Spoon is perfect for dividing the batter in the Perfect Petites.
Make ahead and freeze. Remove from freezer 15 min prior to serving.

products.name: Carrot Cake Mix (Pack of 2)
summary: Our apologies to the other carrot cakes out there but take one bite of our gluten free Carrot Cake, and it will be your go-to from now on. Light, decadent, fluffy, and moist, our gluten free baking mix makes it easy to create show-stopping cakes, cupcakes, and muffins — even for beginner bakers!

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.

products.name: Perfect Petites
summary: A versatile non-stick silicone pan that makes baking the cutest bite-sized portions easy and fun! Go beyond baking and use the Perfect Petites to make ice cubes, portion baby food and sauces, and more!

products.name: 4-in-1 Spice Spoon
summary: Smart, convenient tool for multiple measurements.
